title: VPFL Week 8
author: VD
content_html:
76 Alamo City Spartans (7-1-0)
52 Judean Peoples Front (3-5-0)

63 Mounds View Meerkats (5-3-0)
58 Silver Spooners (3-3-2)

89 Burns Redbeards (6-2-0)
44 Winston Reverends (2-6-0)

74 Greenfield Grizzlies (3-4-1)
60 Valders Valkyries (4-4-0)

76 Masonville Marauders (3-4-1)
37 Black Mouth Curs (2-6-0)

This is your weekly NFL discussion thread. Tennessee is really looking very good now that Fisher has had the sense to give up on the Vince Young Project. Kerry Collins was always a decent quarterback, and Rich Gannon has already showed how a long-time mediocre quarterback can take full advantage of his years of experience towards the end of his career should he find himself with the right team at the right time. They certainly look like the team to beat at the moment. But, as last year’s Super Bowl showed, it must always be kept in mind that the NFL is very seldom a done deal.

VP-AFL

136 Masonville Marauders (7-1-0)
114 The Thunder (4-4-0)

107 Az Hammeroids (6-1-1)
78 Cranberry Bogs (4-4-0)

103 Carpe Oro (3-5-0)
74 Bukkakelypse Boyz (3-5-0)

66 Supernaut’s Jihad (4-4-0)

92 COS McRays (2-6-0)
28 Village Valkyries (2-5-1)
